title: Umar Nurmagomedov Criticizes UFC for Favoring Ilia Topuria
summary: Umar Nurmagomedov has accused the UFC of favoring Ilia Topuria in his pursuit of the vacant lightweight title, alleging that the promotion is promoting Topuria due to his commercial potential.

title: Arman Tsarukyan Named Backup for Topuria vs. Oliveira Title Fight
summary: Arman Tsarukyan has been confirmed as the backup fighter for the upcoming lightweight title bout between Ilia Topuria and Charles Oliveira at UFC 317 on June 28.

title: Kamaru Usman Set for Potential Final Bout Against Joaquin Buckley
summary: Former welterweight champion Kamaru Usman is preparing for what could be his final attempt to reclaim the division's top spot in a fight against Joaquin Buckley.

title: Kayla Harrison Captures UFC Bantamweight Title, Eyes Amanda Nunes Showdown
summary: Kayla Harrison secured the UFC 135-pound title with a dominant submission victory over Julianna Peña at UFC 316, setting the stage for a potential bout with former champion Amanda Nunes.

title: Tom Aspinall Moves On from Jon Jones, Aims for Undisputed Heavyweight Title
summary: Interim UFC heavyweight champion Tom Aspinall believes Jon Jones is effectively retired and is ready to move forward as the undisputed heavyweight champion.

title: Vitor Belfort Inducted into UFC Hall of Fame Class of 2025
summary: Former UFC light heavyweight champion Vitor Belfort has been named to the UFC Hall of Fame Class of 2025, recognizing his significant contributions to the sport.

title: UFC 317: Topuria vs. Oliveira Set for June 28 in Las Vegas
summary: UFC 317, featuring a lightweight title bout between Ilia Topuria and Charles Oliveira, is scheduled for June 28, 2025, at T-Mobile Arena in Las Vegas.

title: UFC on ABC: Hill vs. Rountree Jr. Scheduled for June 21 in Baku
summary: A light heavyweight bout between Jamahal Hill and Khalil Rountree Jr. is set to headline UFC on ABC on June 21, 2025, at Baku Crystal Hall in Baku, Azerbaijan.

title: The Ultimate Fighter 33 Premieres with Coaches Cormier and Sonnen
summary: The Ultimate Fighter 33, featuring coaches Daniel Cormier and Chael Sonnen, has premiered, marking the 20th anniversary of the series with male flyweights and welterweights.

title: UFC 318: Holloway vs. Poirier 3 Announced for July 19 in New Orleans
summary: UFC 318 will feature a lightweight bout between Max Holloway and Dustin Poirier on July 19, 2025, at the Smoothie King Center in New Orleans, marking their third meeting.
